column4: Heya! I've got a machine i installed Hoary on last summer and havent touched since. It has an ATI MACH64 card in it,but only gets 640x4802 even though xorg.confg spegifies 1024x768. any one familiar? also, how do I upgradeit to breezy without the cd?
the machine is at my friend's place, and so am i ;)
